name: Ultimate Puzzles The 7 Wonders
description: Ultimate Puzzles The Seven Wonders is a brand new puzzle game about The New 7 Wonders of the World (Great Wall of China, Colosseum, Petra, Chichén Itzá, Machu Picchu, Taj Mahal, Christ the Redeemer). Each puzzle is 4x4 in size, but the complication is that the puzzles need to be rotated in the right direction.
